content.legion: Grants flat STR, DEX, and LUK

attackStats.name: STR, DEX, LUK
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/hybrid-logic.png} tip={Hybrid Logic (Link Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/supply-surplus.png} tip={Supply Surplus (Beginner Skill)} val={+1% per power unit} val={(Max. +20%)}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/core-overload.png} tip={Core Overload (5th Job)} val={+1% per extra power unit} val={(Max. +20%)}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/structural-integrity.png} tip={Structural Integrity (2nd Job)} val={+25}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hybrid-defenses.png} tip={Hybrid Defenses (3rd Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/star-force-conversion.png} tip={Star Force Conversion (Beginner Skill)} val={+7 per 10 Star Force} val={(Max. +70)}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} subTip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} subVal={extra +400%}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/circuit-surge.png} tip={Circuit Surge (1st Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/xenon-mastery.png} tip={Xenon Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/xenon-expert.png} tip={Xenon Expert (4th Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/loaded-dice.png} tip={Loaded Dice (5th Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/overdrive.png} tip={Overdrive (5th Job)} val={+80% of base weapon attack power} val={-15% of base weapon power while on cooldown}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/multilateral-iv.png} tip={Multilateral VI (4th Job)} val={+40%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/orbital-cataclysm.png} tip={Orbital Cataclysm (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hypogram-field-fusion.png} tip={Hypogram Field: Fusion (5th Job)} val={+20% within field}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/multilateral-iv.png} tip={Multilateral IV (4th Job)} val={+15%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/ooparts-code.png} tip={OOPArts Code (4th Job)} val={+30%}> × <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/core-overload.png} tip={Core Overload (5th Job)} val={+1% per extra power unit} val={(Max. +20%)}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/last-resort.png} tip={Last Resort (5th Job)} val={+13% in Stage 1} val={+30% in Stage 2}>

info: To create one, choose the 'Xenon' option in the Character Creation screen. Xenons have their own separate creation button like Demons. As well, they have a different story than regular Resistance but are part of the same class group

build: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/salvo-system.png} tip={Salvo System}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/propulsion-burst.png} tip={Propulsion Burst}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/radial-nerve.png} tip={Radial Nerve}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/circuit-surge.png} tip={Circuit Surge}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/beam-spline.png} tip={Beam Spline}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/salvo-system-boost-a.png} tip={Salvo System Boost A}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/structural-integrity.png} tip={Structural Integrity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/xenon-mastery.png} tip={Xenon Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/xenon-booster.png} tip={Xenon Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/efficiency-streamline.png} tip={Efficiency Streamline}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/perspective-shift.png} tip={Perspective Shift}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/quicksilver-flash.png} tip={Quicksilver: Flash}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/ion-thrust.png} tip={Ion Thrust}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/salvo-system-boost-b.png} tip={Salvo System Boost B}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/emergency-resupply.png} tip={Emergency Resupply}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/triangulation.png} tip={Triangulation}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/manifest-projector.png} tip={Manifest Projection}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hybrid-defenses.png} tip={Hybrid Defenses}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/combat-switch-explosion.png} tip={Combat Switch: Explosion}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/diagonal-chase.png} tip={Diagonal Chase}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/gravity-pillar.png} tip={Gravity Pillar}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/salvo-system-perfect-boost.png} tip={Salvo System Perfect Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/xenon-expert.png} tip={Xenon Expert}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/instant-shock.png} tip={Instant Shock}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/offensive-matrix.png} tip={Offensive Matrix}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/mecha-purge-snipe.png} tip={Mecha Purge: Snipe}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/ooparts-code.png} tip={OOPArts Code}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/beam-dance.png} tip={Beam Dance}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hypogram-field-penetrate.png} tip={Hypogram Field: Penetrate}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/beam-dance-reinforce.png} tip={Beam Dance - Reinforce}> Beam Dance - Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/mecha-purge-reinforce.png} tip={Mecha Purge - Reinforce}> Mecha Purge - Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hypogram-field-reinforce.png} tip={Hypogram Field - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hypogram-field-speed.png} tip={Hypogram Field - Speed}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hypogram-field-persist.png} tip={Hypogram Field - Persist}> Hypogram Field - Reinforce, Speed, and Persist_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/mecha-purge-snipe.png} tip={All Mecha Purge (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hypogram-field-penetrate.png} tip={All Hypogram Field (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/triangulation.png} tip={Triangulation (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/salvo-system.png} tip={Salvo System (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/beam-dance.png} tip={Beam Dance (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/orbital-cataclysm.png} tip={Orbital Cataclysm (Hyper Skill)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/beam-spline.png} tip={Beam Spline (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/salvo-system.png} tip={Salvo System (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/quicksilver-flash.png} tip={All Quicksilver (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/ion-thrust.png} tip={Ion Thrust (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/combat-switch-explosion.png} tip={All Combat Switch (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/diagonal-chase.png} tip={Diagonal Chase (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/gravity-pillar.png} tip={Gravity Pillar (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/triangulation.png} tip={Triangulation (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/beam-dance.png} tip={Beam Dance (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/mecha-purge-snipe.png} tip={All Mecha Purge (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hypogram-field-penetrate.png} tip={All Hypogram Field (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/entangling-lash.png} tip={Entangling Lash (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/orbital-cataclysm.png} tip={Orbital Cataclysm (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to botnextdoor for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Boost Nodes Build + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Xenon Mechanics
content: Xenon is a hybrid class, they are able to equip both Thief and Pirate equipment. As well, they benefit the most from %All Stat and require a good balance of all stats to get the most range. As well, Xenon's Emblem is called a <tt src={/images/equipment/hybrid-heart.png} tip={Hybrid Heart - Power Source}> Power Source which is bought from <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Neville} title={Neville}>

Xenon also has a secondary resource called <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/supply-surplus.png} tip={Supply Surplus (Beginner Skill)}> Supply Surplus (Beginner Skill) which will give you increased stats as the gauge fills up. Additionally, some of Xenon's skills will consume the Supply Surplus

As well, Xenon can have multiple attack variations that you can switch between using <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/modal-shift.png} tip={Modal Shift (Beginner Skill)}> Modal Shift (Beginner Skill)

primary.name: Supply Surplus
primary.shortDesc: Recharges one power unit every 4 sec, and grants a 60% chance to recharge one unit on hit/evade. +1% all stats per extra power unit.

primary.name: Multilateral I
primary.shortDesc:
[At 20+ STR] 3% for Knockback Resistance
[At 20+ DEX] 3% for Elemental Resistance, 3 for Abnormal Status Resistance
[At 20+ LUK] 3% Avoidability
[At 20+ STR, DEX, and LUK] 3% Damage
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses upon reaching a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Promessa Escape
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30. Summons the Promessa to return you to base.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Modal Shift
primary.shortDesc: Use this skill simultaneously with another skill to activate its alternate modes. Reactivate this skill to revert back.
primary.desc: Allows you to switch between different attacks
details: Pressing this repeatedly Skill Key will switch between your 2nd, 3rd, and 4th Job skill options

primary.name: Liberty Boosters
primary.shortDesc: Activate the booster to fly for 30 sec. Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: While active, you will be able to fly for a short duration
details: Only buffs can be used while in the air

primary.name: Mimic Protocol
primary.shortDesc: Lets you ignore equipment stat requirements. Also lets you equip Pirate and Thief equipment.

primary.name: Star Force Conversion
primary.shortDesc: Increases STR, DEX and LUK in proportion to the Star Force of your equipped items
details: For every 10 Star Force (up to 100 stars), gain 7 STR, DEX, and LUK

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/65/A_Warm(er)_Welcome} title={"A Warm(er) Welcome"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Beam Spline
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 9, Damage: 150%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Swing your Whip Blade forward twice

primary.name: Propulsion Burst
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10. Adds an extra jump when used in midair. Can be used 2 times back to back.\nAfter this skill is used to move upward, Quicksilver: Takeoff and Diagonal Chase can only be used once.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row

While in the air, pressing the Up Arrow and Jump Key will perform a vertical jump<bp_Upon use, the following skills can only be used one-time while in the air <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/quicksilver-takeoff.png} tip={Quicksilver: Takeoff (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/diagonal-chase.png} tip={Diagonal Chase (3rd Job)}>_>

primary.name: Circuit Surge
primary.shortDesc: [Supply]\nEnergy Cost: 3, Weapon ATT: +30, Duration: 240 sec

primary.name: Radial Nerve
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Max Speed: +20, Jump: +10

primary.name: Multilateral II
primary.shortDesc:
[At 40+ STR] Knockback Resistance 5%
[At 40+ DEX] Elemental Resistance 5%, Abnormal Status Resistance 5
[At 40+ LUK] Avoidability +5%
[At 40+ STR, DEX, and LUK] Damage +5%, Max HP & MP +5%
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses upon reaching a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Salvo System
primary.shortDesc: Damage to enemies in range from direct skill attack: 50%, Number of Rockets: 4\nDamage Against Normal Enemies: +250% points\nCooldown: 2 sec.
primary.desc: While toggled, successful direct attacks fire rockets at nearby enemies
details: Deals increased %Damage to regular monsters by a flat amount
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Quicksilver: Flash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 145%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slash your Whip Blade several times in front of you

primary.name: Quicksilver: Concentrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 240%, Number of Attacks: 2, Critical Rate: +30%
primary.desc: Swing your Whip Blade forward
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate

primary.name: Quicksilver: Takeoff
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 16, Damage: 155%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Lash your Whip Blade while boosting you up into the air
details: After casting, <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/propulsion-burst.png} tip={Propulsion Burst (1st Job)}> vertical jump cannot be used before landing

primary.name: Ion Thrust
primary.shortDesc: [Supply]\nEnergy Cost: 3, MP Cost per attack: 6, Max Enemies: 6 Damage: 60%, Knocks back enemies. Duration: 8. Energy is consumed only when the Ion Thrust is summoned.
primary.desc: Hop onto an Ion Thruster that damages and pushes enemies back

primary.name: Efficiency Streamline
primary.shortDesc: Max HP/MP: +30%

primary.name: Perspective Shift
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +40%

primary.name: Xenon Booster
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2\nMax HP/MP: +1000

primary.name: Structural Integrity
primary.shortDesc: All Stats: +25

primary.name: Xenon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Mastery: +50%, Attack Power +20

primary.name: Multilateral III
primary.shortDesc:
[At 90+ STR] Knockback Resistance +7%
[At 90+ DEX] Elemental Resistance +7%, Abnormal Status Resistance +7
[At 90+ LUK] Avoidability +7%
[At 90+ STR, DEX, and LUK] Damage +7%, Max HP/MP +5%
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses upon reaching a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Salvo System Boost A
primary.shortDesc: Salvo System Damage: +40%p
details: Increases %Damage of the attack by a flat amount

primary.name: Combat Switch: Explosion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 250%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Thrust your Whip Blade forward which will then explode

primary.name: Combat Switch: Air Whip
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 270%, Number of Attacks: 2, Additional damage on airborne enemies: 190%
primary.desc: Swing your Whip Blade forward
details: Deals increased %Damage to enemies in the air

primary.name: Combat Switch: Fission
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 271%, Number of Attacks: 3, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Split your Whip Blade to damage enemies below you
details: Can only be used in the air
Can be combined with <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/diagonal-chase.png} tip={Diagonal Chase (3rd Job)}>
After casting, <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/propulsion-burst.png} tip={Propulsion Burst (1st Job)}> vertical jump cannot be used before landing

primary.name: Diagonal Chase
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 21, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 260% to knock back enemies.
primary.desc: Dash diagonally while pushing back enemies
details: Can be used during <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/gravity-pillar.png} tip={Gravity Pillar (3rd Job)}>

primary.name: Gravity Pillar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 301%, Number of Attacks: 1, Launches enemies into the air.
primary.desc: Create a zone from below that lifts enemies into the air

primary.name: Hybrid Defenses
primary.shortDesc: Bonus Avoidability: +45%, Damage Taken: -10%\nAll Stats +10, Defense +400.

primary.name: Triangulation
primary.shortDesc: Chance to attach Airframe on attack: 30%, Max Airframes: 3\nDamage when enemy with 3 Airframes is attacked: 340%, Number of Attacks: 3\nEnemy Accuracy for each Airframe: -24%
primary.desc: Attacks have a chance to attach "Airframes". Once 3 "Airframes" are attached to an enemy, the stacks are consumed and will deal damage to the enemy
details: Enemy has decreased %Accuracy and %Avoidability for each Airframe
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Manifest Projector
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Creates a clone hologram. Projection makes an additional hit that is 70% of Final Damage. Projection disappears after losing 1000% of your Max HP.
primary.desc: Create a clone that mimics your attacks, increasing the number of hits you deal per attack
details: The clone only disappears after losing a proportion of your %Max HP
Clone's attacks deal reduced %Final Damage
Does not mimic <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/salvo-system.png} tip={Salvo System (1st Job)}>, summoning skills, and 5th Job Common Skills

primary.name: Multilateral IV
primary.shortDesc:
[At 150+ STR] Knockback Resistance +10%
[At 150+ DEX] Elemental Resistance +10%, Abnormal Status Resistance +10
[At 150+ LUK] Avoidability +10%
[At 150+ STR, DEX, and LUK] Damage +10%, Max HP/MP +10%
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses upon reaching a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Emergency Resupply
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 75, Extra power unit charged: 10. Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Instantly grants extra charges of Energy

primary.name: Salvo System Boost B
primary.shortDesc: Salvo System Damage: +85%p
details: Increases %Damage of the attack by a flat amount

primary.name: Beam Dance
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost per attack: 9, Damage: 260%, Number of Attacks: 1, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Violently swing your Whip Blade around yourself
details: You can move and jump while attacking

primary.name: Mecha Purge: Snipe
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 395%, Max Enemies Hit: 1, Number of Attacks: 7, Enemy DEF Ignored: 30%
primary.desc: Deal a focused attack towards a single enemy with the highest HP
details: Attack has increased %Ignore DEF
Prioritizes bosses with the highest HP first

primary.name: Mecha Purge: Bombard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 350%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8
primary.desc: Blast a laser forward damaging multiple enemies

primary.name: Mecha Purge: Bombardment
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 25, Damage: 405%, Number of Attacks: 5, Max Enemies Hit: 15
primary.desc: Bombard enemies from the air with missiles and lasers

primary.name: Hypogram Field: Penetrate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Hypogram Field Duration: 60, Damage on contact: 213%\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Create a zone where a bouncing orb damages enemies it comes in contact with
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Hypogram Field: Force Field
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Duration of hypogram field: 60, Max enemies hit when ball touches field: 8, Damage: 400%, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Create a zone where enemies are damaged each time a bouncing orb touches the force field
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Hypogram Field: Support
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 31, Duration of hypogram field: 60, Ally Max HP Boost: 10%, Power units recharged when allies evade: +1.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Create a zone where party members within will gain increased %Max HP, %Avoidability
details: Whenever party members dodge an attack, gain 1 Energy

primary.name: OOPArts Code
primary.shortDesc: [Supply]\nEnergy Cost: 20, Duration: 60, Final Damage: +30%, Boss Damage: +30%

primary.name: Instant Shock
primary.shortDesc: Chance of Additional Evasion: 40%, Salvo System Damage: +49%

primary.name: Xenon Expert
primary.shortDesc: Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +30, Critical Damage: +8%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

primary.name: Temporal Pod
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration of party cooldown reduction effect: 60.\nCooldown: 120 sec
primary.desc: When activated, reduce the skill cooldowns of nearby party members
details: The pod is destroyed when you are hit
Has no effect on skills that are not affected by cooldown resets

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Offensive Matrix
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: 50%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +30%

primary.name: Multilateral V
primary.shortDesc:
[At 260+ STR] Knockback Resistance +10%
[At 260+ DEX] Elemental Resistance +10%, Abnormal Status Resistance +10
[At 260+ LUK] Avoidability +10%
[At 260+ STR, DEX, and LUK] Damage +10%, Max HP/MP +10%
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses upon reaching a certain amount of stats

primary.name: Salvo System Perfect Boost
primary.shortDesc: Salvo System Damage's +60%p
details: Increases %Damage of the attack by a flat amount

primary.name: Multilateral VI
primary.shortDesc:
Permanently Final Damage: +15%
[At 330+ STR] 15% for Knockback Resistance
[At 330+ DEX] 15% for Elemental Resistance, 5 for Abnormal Status Resistance
[At 330+ LUK]: 5% Avoidability
[At 330+ STR, DEX, and LUK] +5% Damage
primary.desc: Grants special bonuses upon reaching a certain amount of stats
details: Now also increases %Final Damage

hyperPassive.name: Mecha Purge - Spread
hyperPassive.desc: Increases the maximum number of enemies hit by <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/mecha-purge-bombard.png} tip={Mecha Purge: Bombard (4th Job)}>

hyperActive.name: Amaranth Generator
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Gauge Charge: Max, Charge duration: 10 sec\nCooldown: 90 sec
hyperActive.desc: While active, skills will not consume the <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/supply-surplus.png} tip={Supply Surplus (Beginner Skill)}> Supply Surplus and the gauge will gain max charge

hyperActive.name: Entangling Lash
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 700%, Number of Attacks: 4, Chance to Debuff: 100%, Bind Duration: 10 sec.\nBind Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Entangling Lash.\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Lash your Whip Blade forward, binding enemies hit

hyperActive.name: Orbital Cataclysm
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1500%, Number of Attacks: 6, DEF: -30% for 10 sec. Invincible while casting.\nAfter casting, increases damage by 10% for 25 sec\nCooldown: 50 sec
hyperActive.desc: Fire a powerful laser cannon that reduces enemy %DEF and grants a %Damage buff
details: Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF
Invincible while casting
Unaffected by cooldown reduction

fifthMain.name: Omega Blaster
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 660%, Number of Attacks: 6, Duration: 6 sec, Invincible while attacking
Hold down skill key to charge for up to 90 sec. Duration increases by 1 sec for every 3 sec charged (up to 6 sec max). If you exceed the max charge time, the charge will be canceled.
Press the skill key again while attacking to cancel immediately.
Cooldown: 165 sec., starting after the attack begins.
fifthMain.desc: Charge and release a powerful laser beam
details: Holding down the Skill Key before releasing will increase the duration of the skill
Pressing the Skill Key again while firing will cancel the attack early
You are invincible while firing the laser

fifthMain.name: Core Overload
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 250, Duration: 70 sec.
Consumes 1% Max MP + 220 per sec. Allows you to charge 20 additional Surplus Energy. Energy charging time reduced to 1 sec.
Final Damage increases by 1% per Surplus Energy charged.
Use skill again to deactivate it. Extra Surplus Energy disappears immediately on skill deactivation.
Periodically generates plasma currents that activate electricity 2 times striking up to 12 enemies for 390% damage 6 times.
Cooldown: 180 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, increases your <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/supply-surplus.png} tip={Supply Surplus (Beginner Skill)}> maximum storage capacity
details: While active, gain increased %Final Damage for each Energy unit and Energy charging time is reduced to 1 sec
While active, periodically release plasma that damages nearby enemies
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the skill early
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Hypogram Field: Fusion
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP cost: 1000, Hologram Field generated for 30 sec.
Whenever the orb makes contact with the Hologram Field, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 550%, Number of Attacks: 5. The same amount of damage is inflicted when the orb touches monsters.
Damage inflicted by party members within the field is increased by 20%, 1 surplus energy recharged whenever a party member within the field evades an attack.
Cooldown: 90 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create a force field that has the combined effects of all 3 Hypogram Fields
details: Increases %Damage of party members inside the field<bp_Recharges 1 Energy whenever a party member attacks within the field evades an attack_>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Photon Ray
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 150, aim mode activates for 20 sec. Additional 350 MP consumed upon firing.
Initial shots are 3 blast each. Can take up to 15 additional shots are 15 shots.
Photonic cannon attacks 3 times with 880% damage per shot.
Cooldown: 30 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Summon a photon cannon that slowly aims and targets enemies before releasing homing missiles at targeted enemies
details: On initial cast, enemies one by one will be aimed at before becoming a target<bp_Moving too far away from enemies that are being aimed at will cancel the targetting_Targetting begins fast and eventually slows down_Attacking enemies that are being aimed at will complete the targetting faster_>
Pressing the Skill Key again will fire the photon cannon<bp_If it is not pressed before the aiming phase ends, the photon cannon will not fire_>
Photon cannon will prioritize bosses with the highest max HP

Can be used at the same time while casting <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/mecha-purge-snipe.png} tip={Mecha Purge: Snipe (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/orbital-cataclysm.png} tip={Orbital Cataclysm (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/omega-blaster.png} tip={Omega Blaster (5th Job)}>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/manifest-projector.png} tip={Manifest Projector (3rd Job)}>

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/mecha-purge-snipe.png} tip={All Mecha Purge (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Mecha Purge: Snipe
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 510%, Number of Attacks: 7
Enhances to HEXA Mecha Purge: Execute every 8 sec.
Ignore Defense: +40%
------HEXA Mecha Purge: Execute------
MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 330%, Number of Attacks: 7, Number of Explosions: 3, Ignore Defense: +40%
Cooldown: 8 sec
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Mecha Purge: Bombardment
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 655%, Number of Attacks: 5
Enhances to HEXA Mecha Purge: Fire every 6 sec.
------HEXA Mecha Purge: Fire------
MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 655%, Number of Attacks: 7
Cooldown: 6 sec
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/triangulation.png} tip={Triangulation (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/resistance/xenon/hypogram-field-penetrate.png} tip={All Hypogram Field (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Hypogram Field: Penetrate
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Hypogram Field Duration: 60 sec\nDamage on contact: 540%\nCooldown: 29 sec
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Hypogram Field: Force Field
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Hypogram Field Duration: 60 sec.\n[When an orb contacts that Hypogram Field] - Hypogram Field, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1000%\nCooldown: 29 sec.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Hypogram Field: Support
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Duration of hypogram field: 60 sec.\nAlly Max HP Boost: 11%, Power units recharged when allies evade: +1.\nCooldown: 29 sec.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Triangulation
masteryCore.shortDesc: Chance for attack to attach Airframe: 30%, Damage: 410%, Number of Attack: 3\nMax Airframe Stack: 3, Attacking an enemy with 3 Airframe triggers 4 plasma currents that deal 240% damage 4 times.\nEnemy Accuracy per Airframe: -8%
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Artificial Evolution
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 710%, Number of Attacks: 7, Number of Bombardments: 31, Evolution Duration: 30 sec
Evolved State: enemy attacked by Xenon, Damage: 1080%, Number of Attacks: 5, Enhanced Airframes Summoned: 6, Cooldown: 1.8 sec
Using enhanced Liberty Boosters increases flight speed, and some buff and attacks can be used while flying.
When Omega Blaster triggers during enhanced Liberty Boosters, it can be set up which reduces its attack interval time. Reduces attack duration to 5 sec and increases attack duration by 1 sec per 6 sec of charged duration (max 3 sec). Invincible for 2 sec after setting up.
Cooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: Core Overload Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Core Overload Final Damage: +60%, Surplus Energy: +30, Energy Charge Duration: -50%

meta: Xenon is an STR, DEX, and LUK hybrid Thief and Pirate class part of the Resistance class group. Since Xenon is a hybrid class, they are able to equip both Thief and Pirate equipment. As well, they benefit the most from %All Stat and require a good balance of all stats to get the most range
